item.title: 园丁集 41
item.description: I long to speak the deepest words I have to say to you ; But I dare not, for fear you should laugh. That is why I laugh at myself and shatter my secret in jest. I make light of my pain, afraid you should do so. I long to tell you the truest words I have to say to you; But I dare not, being afraid that you would not believe them. That is why I disguise them in untruth, Saying the contrary of what I mean. I make my pain appear absurd, afraid that you should do so.
